name: BusinessStories
0:
”Alexa, open business stories”
”Alexa, start business stories”
”Alexa, ask business stories for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: business stories
des:
Are you an up and coming entrepreneur who needs some encouragement? I built this app to show entrepreneurs just how random business can be. I have compiled a number of secret stories of how so many of the businesses we know and love got to where they are today with a little bit of luck. Some of these untold stories are pretty aww inspiring and some are downright hilarious. After hearing the stories from this Alexa Skill you'll be inspired to keep moving forward and taking chances in your business, but please don't bet your life savings on a game of blackjack like someone you'll hear about!


How it works: Ask Alexa for "Business Stories". When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next story. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
